title: Smart Data Models - Mapping of ACRIS data model AirportElevationUnitOfMeasurement
description: Property. The unit of measure of the height of an Airport above sea level (FT for foot or M for metre).

type.description: Property. It must be equal to AirportElevationUnitOfMeasurement.

Name.description: Property. The name of the unit of measure for an Airport elevation above sea level.
